nodes.text: This Kowakian monkey-lizard was a back-stabbing and greedy bounty hunter who, sometime after the male Wookiee Chewbacca temporarily escaped enslavement, turned him over to the Galactic Empire.

The Kowakian monkey-lizard bounty hunter was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide by Pablo Hidalgo. In the non-canon television series LEGO Star Wars: All-Stars, the bounty hunter was named "Radka", and had green skin and purple hair.
